Package tr.edu.ku.devnull.needforspear.View.PlayViews

  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    AnimatorStrategy
    The strategy pattern for drawing different animations by game object types: Sphere and Obstacle
    MagicalHexSubscriber
    Observer pattern for MagicalHexSpell.
    SwitchModeSubscriber
    Observer pattern on Switch to Running Mode button where the subscriber is the GamePanel to animate obstacles and sphere depending on if the game is in running or build mode
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    GamePanel
    GamePanel for incorporating animations of game objects, and key and mouse events
    GameView
    Gameview allows player to build, load or save a map and play it
    HelpView
    ActivationView lets user to activate their account to play the game.
    MainMenuView
    MainMenuView lets user to select from the set of options to play the game.
